channel.title: How do you change the amount of xp
channel.description: how do you change the amount of xp given per (1) damage say i hit a 1 i want it to give say like 500 xp or somthing

item.title: How do you change the amount of xp
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

search in client.java for like

// Defensive

You should see codes like this:

} else if (FightType == 4) // Defensive { TotalExp = (double) (850 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerDefence);

The 850 is the xp u get per 1 damage.

For your case, change it to 500. Do it to all of them, otherwise youll only get the 500xp per damage for defence.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change the amount of xp
